website_summaries.verdict: German sneaker brand Puma updated its iconic Basket silhouette with a deluxe version through the Puma Basket Classic Gum Deluxe. Shadowing the original tooling from the ‘70s version, this modern rendition features a soft tumbled leather upper and a contrasting gum rubber outsole for a retro look that most buyers found stylish and appealing.High ratings were given to this shoe for its overall superb comfort, fit, and design. The only downside is that limited colorways were made, so buyers do not have many options available when selecting a pair.
pros: The Puma Basket Classic Gum Deluxe is very comfortable to wear, according to numerous reviewers
Although branded as a deluxe version, this rendition of the Puma Basket is still affordable
Some commenters stated that they like the colors of this low-top Puma shoe
Several reviewers were pleased with this shoe's excellent fit
Many buyers stated that the Basket Classic Gum Deluxe sneakers are stylish enough
The Puma Basket Classic Gum Deluxe received lots of high ratings from the majority of wearers
cons: The Puma Basket Classic Gum Deluxe is offered in limited colorways

customer_reviews.title: Get the right size - comfy - nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: It looks well made. The leather upper is actually quite good & very soft making the shoe quite comfortable. Pumas (this one is made in Indonesia) are about 1/4-1/2 size smaller than Adidas (a pair of mine was made in Vietnam) so order accordingly. I am not sure how the leather (for either pair) will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Basket Classic Gum Deluxe Sneaker
product_meta.description: Originate from the PUMA archive back in 1971, its singular but yet clean and simple design propelled the basket classic into the sneaker Hall of Fame. This new iteration comes into a Deluxe version, built on the original basket tooling for a clean, sleek, classic look comprised of a leather on leather upper and formstripe and a gum outsole to add a classy contrast to the shoe.
